Class.Name: ComputeCost
Class.Description: Calculates the cost gradient for a machine learning model against a set of activations and a set of expected outputs.

Parameter.Name: Model
Parameter.Description: The model to compute the cost gradient for.

Parameter.Name: Activations
Parameter.Description: The set of activation values to apply to the model (must match the models input count).

Parameter.Name: ExpectedOutput
Parameter.Description: The expected outputs given the provided inputs (must match the models output count).
